mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.product_id AS "product.id", a.price AS "price", a.quantity AS "quantity", a.unit AS "unit", a.intro AS "intro", a.is_retail AS "isRetail", a.release_date AS "releaseDate", a.expiry_date AS "expiryDate", a.company AS "company", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", product.name AS "product.name", createBy.name AS "createBy.name", updateBy.name AS "updateBy.name"
LEFT JOIN j_product product ON product.id = a.product_id LEFT JOIN sys_user createBy ON createBy.id = a.create_by LEFT JOIN sys_user updateBy ON updateBy.id = a.update_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO j_warehouse( id, product_id, price, quantity, unit, intro, is_retail, release_date, expiry_date, company, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{product.id}, #{price}, #{quantity}, #{unit}, #{intro}, #{isRetail}, #{releaseDate}, #{expiryDate}, #{company}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE j_warehouse SET product_id = #{product.id}, price = #{price}, quantity = #{quantity}, unit = #{unit}, intro = #{intro}, is_retail = #{isRetail}, release_date = #{releaseDate}, expiry_date = #{expiryDate}, company = #{company}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM j_warehouse a
a.del_flag = 0 and a.product_id = #{id} and a.is_retail = ${isRetail} and a.company = '${company}'
order by a.is_retail desc, a.create_date asc
